suites.title: Checking User Permission for Identification User Role

tests.title: Success Login
tests.fullTitle: Checking User Permission for Identification User Role Success Login

tests.title: 2FA Login with totp Code
tests.fullTitle: Checking User Permission for Identification User Role 2FA Login with totp Code

tests.title: Perform 1:N Identification with Results
tests.fullTitle: Checking User Permission for Identification User Role Perform 1:N Identification with Results
tests.code:
console.log("--Perform 1:N Identification with Results--")
identifyResponse = await request (url)
    .post("/api/FaceRecognition/identify")
    .set("Accept", "*/*")
    .set("Content-Type", "application/json")
    .set("Authorization", `Bearer ${accessToken}`)
    .send({
        photoData: idImage,
        faceThreshold: "1.0",
        maxResults: "10",
        genderFilter:null
    })
expect(identifyResponse.status).to.equal(200);
expect(identifyResponse.body.success).to.equal(true);
expect(identifyResponse.body.identifiedCitizens).to.be.an("array").that.is.not.empty;
expect(identifyResponse.body.identifiedCitizens[0]).to.include.all.keys(
    "nik",
    "name",
    "dateOfBirth",
    "placeOfBirth",
    "gender",
    "address",
    "religion",
    "bloodType",
    "maritalStatus",
    "occupation",
    "nationality",
    "motherName",
    "fatherName",
    "provinceName",
    "regencyName",
    "districtName",
    "villageName",
    "familyCardNumber",
    "age",
    "faceImage",
    "signatureImage"
);

tests.title: Perform 1:N Identification without Results
tests.fullTitle: Checking User Permission for Identification User Role Perform 1:N Identification without Results

tests.title: Perform 1:1 Verification
tests.fullTitle: Checking User Permission for Identification User Role Perform 1:1 Verification
tests.code:
console.log("--Perform 1:1 Verification--")
verifResponse = await request (url)
    .post("/api/FaceRecognition/verify")
    .set("Accept", "*/*")
    .set("Content-Type", "application/json")
     .set("Authorization", `Bearer ${accessToken}`)
    .send({
        nik: process.env.NIK_VERIF,
        base64Photo: verifImage,
        faceThreshold: "1.0",
    })
expect(verifResponse.status).to.equal(403);
